name: Bound (itch)
description:
Hi there! Thanks for taking an interest in Bound! I really appreciate your patronage.

Bound is a 2.5d exploration platformer that was created as a student project over 16 weeks by a lone developer (that would be me) and is in fact my first game.

You play as Joot Lightray, a down on his luck space explorer who crash lands on a strange alien planet. In order to find rescue he must collect various gravity themed power ups to allow access to new areas of the game world.

Although a demo/prototype student project, the game does tell a complete story and contain all features. The game world is still quite small so it'll probably take less than an hour to complete. There are still a few kinks in there - some animations glitch etc, however it shouldn't give any major trouble and is still highly playable!

Give it a shot and let me know what you think- drop me a comment on twitter at @michaelarby. This was my first game and was basically my intro to the Unity engine. However, if feedback is positive I'll consider developing it further into a full game.

Thanks guys!

Michael
